comment.author: 23492747@N04
comment._content: I love this photo!  Do you know if the Foundation's archives include any similar sort of photo, from roughly the same time period (I am presuming this is 1930s or 1940s), of the cafe/bar at the miradouro at Largo das Portas do Sol - perhaps people sitting at the tables drinking a bica or a beer and looking out over the views of Alfama or across Rio Tejo? Are there any pictures of Lisboa's miradouros at all in the archive?

comment.author: 37530958@N02
comment._content: Foto publicada na revista Ilustração n .137 Setembro de 1931.
